meanings.sent1: The data was analyzable by the researchers.
meanings.sent2: The report contained analyzable information for the team to review.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle was so analyzable that even a child could solve it.
meanings.sent4: Her expression was like an analyzable code, revealing her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The analyzable patterns in nature fascinated the scientist.

meanings.definition: Capable of being broken down into smaller parts for examination.
meanings.sent1: The complex system was not easily analyzable by the students.
meanings.sent2: The chemical compound was analyzable into its basic elements.
meanings.sent3: The analyzable toy was a hit with the children, who loved taking it apart.
meanings.sent4: His argument was like an analyzable puzzle, with each point fitting perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The analyzable structure of the building amazed the architects.
